name: Ringer Hut
summary: Recruiting staff for Ringer Hut Japanese restaurant - Kitchen and service staff. Full-time positions with salary of 14,300++ baht. Requirements include Thai nationality, 20-45 years old, at least 1 year of experience in a restaurant, ability to work shifts, 8 hours work (2 hours break), and 6 days/week.
